Package test.nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp6.fuzz

Class FuzzTest

java.lang.Object
test.nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp6.fuzz.FuzzTest
public class FuzzTest extends Object
This class is used to fuzz test the game. It will randomly generate a sequence of actions and then play them. It will then check if the game has crashed. It will then repeat this process a number of times. It will then print out the number of crashes.
